project.description:
This suite executes an exhaustive set of tests against subscription-manager-gui based upon the following TCMS suite:
https://tcms.engineering.redhat.com/plan/2110/

Tests against cert-fte-candlepin.devlab.redhat.com on a nightly basis


MANUAL INSTRUCTIONS:

  • Click 'Build Now' to manually begin a test run.
  • From the list of fields, read their descriptions and set the values appropriate for your testing.
  • Then click the 'Build' button.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CLIENT_HOSTNAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: hostname of client running VNC server/funcd

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CLIENT_LOCALUSER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: local user on client to run test under

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CLIENT_USERNAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: username used to register to a Candlepin server

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CLIENT_PASSWORD
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: password used to register to a Candlepin server

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RHSM_LOCALCERT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: URL where one can download a valid Candlepin entitlement certificate

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RHSM_REGTOKEN
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Registration token one can use to register to a Candlepin server

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SERVER_BASEURL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: base URL to Candlepin server as set in /etc/rhsm/rhsm.conf (you can usually leave this one alone)

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash -xe cd $WORKSPACE if [ -d automatjon ]; then cd automatjon git clean -dxf git pull else git clone git://git.rhndev.redhat.com/automatjon fi
cd $WORKSPACE
if [ -d webui-framework ]; then cd webui-framework git clean -dxf git pull else git clone git://github.com/weissjeffm/webui-framework.git fi
chmod 600 $WORKSPACE/automatjon/jon/.ssh/id*
cd $WORKSPACE/automatjon rm -rf smgui.tgz sm-tests.properties subscription-manager-gui/test-output/ subscription-manager-gui/results.tgz tar cvzf smgui.tgz subscription-manager-gui/
echo "#auto-generated sm-tests.properties via Hudson rhsm.client.username: $CLIENT_USERNAME rhsm.client.password: $CLIENT_PASSWORD rhsm.client.regtoken: $RHSM_REGTOKEN rhsm.server.hostname: cert-fte-candlepin.devlab.redhat.com rhsm.server.port: 443 rhsm.server.baseurl: $SERVER_BASEURL rhsm.rpm: $RHSM_RPM rhsm.gui.rpm: $RHSM_GUI_RPM rhsm.localcert: $RHSM_LOCALCERT " > $WORKSPACE/sm-tests.properties
sudo func "$CLIENT_HOSTNAME" call command run "rm -rf /tmp/smgui.tgz /tmp/subscription-manager-gui" scp $WORKSPACE/automatjon/smgui.tgz $CLIENT_LOCALUSER@$CLIENT_HOSTNAME:/tmp/smgui.tgz scp $WORKSPACE/sm-tests.properties $CLIENT_LOCALUSER@$CLIENT_HOSTNAME:/tmp/sm-tests.properties sudo func "$CLIENT_HOSTNAME" call command run "tar -C /tmp -xvzf /tmp/smgui.tgz" sudo func "$CLIENT_HOSTNAME" call command run "mkdir /tmp/subscription-manager-gui/test-output" sudo func "$CLIENT_HOSTNAME" call command run "touch /tmp/subscription-manager-gui/test-output/smgui-results.xml" sudo func "$CLIENT_HOSTNAME" call command run "sudo nosetests --with-xunit --xunit-file=/tmp/subscription-manager-gui/test-output/smgui-results.xml /tmp/subscription-manager-gui/*tests.py" sudo func "$CLIENT_HOSTNAME" call command run "tar cvzf /tmp/subscription-manager-gui/results.tgz /tmp/subscription-manager-gui/test-output/*"
mkdir -p $WORKSPACE/automatjon/subscription-manager-gui/test-output/ scp $CLIENT_LOCALUSER@$CLIENT_HOSTNAME:/tmp/subscription-manager-gui/results.tgz $WORKSPACE/automatjon/subscription-manager-gui/test-output/results.tgz cd $WORKSPACE/automatjon/subscription-manager-gui/test-output/ tar xvzf results.tgz mv $WORKSPACE/automatjon/subscription-manager-gui/test-output/tmp/subscription-manager-gui/test-output/* . rm -rf $WORKSPACE/automatjon/subscription-manager-gui/test-output/tmp/ touch $WORKSPACE/automatjon/subscription-manager-gui/test-output/smgui-results.xml
